SM-T585 FRP Removal

  1. Flash T585XXU2AQA2_BTU2APL2_UK_6.0.1 from flash files drive
  2. Insert a sim card into the device
  3. Boot device and connect to WiFi
  4. Connect device to PC and open FRPToolPro (if you have not previously used this software you will need to activate it
  5. Select the Bypass tab
  6. Ensure the samsung modem is selected in the PORT box at the top of the window
  7. Enter any phone number and press dial, the device will now attempt to make a call
  8. Hang up the call and press the Create contact button (select device if asked where to store contact)
  9. Expand the contact options by pressing the arrow at the bottom right
  10. Click the web address field and add http://addrom.com/bypass and save the contact
  11. Click the web address in the displayed contact, this will open a browser window
  12. Click the Android_6_GAM.apk and QuickShortcutMaker.apk links to download the files
  13. Long press on any text at the bottom to highlight it and select Assist
  14. Type My Files and select the my files app when displayed
  15. Click the android_6_gam.apk apk files to install them, you will be warned about unknown sources, enable it to allow installation of the files
